StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramDescrip.onsByProgramType]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProgramType varchar(4) AS
SELECT PROGRAM_ID AS ID, PROGRAM_CODE + ' - ' + PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION AS Descrip.on FROM [dbo].[PROGRAM] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PROGRAM_TYPE = @ProgramType AND STATUS = 'A' ORDER BY Descrip.on
